Summary: A dish shape craft appeared during the day inside the city limits of Loudon.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Loudon
There were no other sightings in Loudon on or around August 6th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailstoday at lunch [12:50 PM} August 6 2010 I was going to go to my car and get some papers, when I got up front Doug was standing at the front door and told me there was something in the sky but he did not know what it was I went out with him to see what it was. I told him it's a UFO we watch it about 15 minute, until it went out of our sight. this is what happen when I went outside with Doug the UFO was moving slow less then 5 miles a hour . it would move forward then it would stop and hover 3 or 4 times the object was dish shape and black. then the craft started to rise higher then it would stopped, then start rise higher and higher until it went out of our sight. the sky was cloudy it was getting ready to rain but it was not raining, when the dish shape object appeared the object was under the clouds there was no sound coming from the craft.
